cards.title: Cathain
powers: If you have a Locus in play, reveal cards from your deck until a card that shares a keyword with one of your Loci is revealed. Put that card in your hand and shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck. Otherwise, search your deck or trash for a Locus and put it into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card
One player may draw a card
One hero may deal themselves 1 irreducible infernal damage. If they take damage this way, they may deal 1 other target 3 cold, fire, lightning, or melee damage.

openingLines.default: I wield the most ancient of magicks. You cannot stand before me.
openingLines.AbhartachCharacter: My old enemy, this time you shall fall for good.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: And I will face you all the same, no matter what awaits.

cards.title: Aetheric Locus
body: When this card enters play, destroy your other Loci. Whenever you play another Air card, this card deals 1 target 2 lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: These winds are perfect. I will{br}draw power here.

cards.title: Arcane Shielding
body: Redirect damage dealt to {Cathain} to one of your Loci. At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Your technique has only gotten{br}sloppier over the centuries.

cards.title: Choking Ash
body: When this card enters play, increase the next damage dealt to each non-hero target by 1 and {Cathain} or one of your Loci deals itself 6 irreducible infernal damage.
After a non-hero target deals damage to another target, they deal themselves 2 toxic damage.
At the end of your turn, if this card did not enter play this turn, destroy it.

cards.title: Dust Storm
body: When this card enters play, prevent the next damage dealt by each non-hero target and {Cathain} or one of your Loci deals itself 6 irreducible infernal damage.
At the start of each turn, {Cathain} deals up to 3 targets 1 projectile damage each.
At the end of your turn, if this card did not enter play this turn, destroy it.

flavorQuotes.text: May the desert strike you down!

cards.title: Earth Crack
body: {Cathain} deals 1 target 3 melee damage then deals that target 2 melee damage. {Cathain} or one of your Loci deals itself 3 irreducible infernal damage.

cards.title: Elemental Attunement
body: Whenever you play a one-shot card that shares a keyword with a Locus in play, you may draw a card or {Cathain} gains 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Magic is not so simple a thing as words and gestures. You must [i]feel[/i] it inside you.

cards.title: Elemental Outburst
body: Play up to 3 one-shots that share a keyword with a Locus in play. Immediately end your turn.

flavorQuotes.text: This land shall not fall while I stand!

cards.title: Freeze Blood
body: {Cathain} deals 1 target 4 cold damage. Reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your turn. {Cathain} or one of your Loci deals itself 3 irreducible infernal damage.

flavorQuotes.text: This time, I will find a way to{br}end you for good.

cards.title: Hurricane
body: When this card enters play, play the top 2 cards of the environment deck and {Cathain} or one of your Loci deals itself 6 irreducible infernal damage.
At the start of each turn, destroy an environment card. If a card is destroyed this way, {Cathain} deals 1 target 2 lightning and 2 cold damage.
At the end of your turn, if this card did not enter play this turn, destroy it.

flavorQuotes.text: Let up! You're gonna sink us too!

cards.title: Lightning Strike
body: {Cathain} deals 1 target 4 lightning damage, then deals each other non-hero target 1 sonic damage. {Cathain} or one of your Loci deals itself 3 irreducible infernal damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You think he's taking apprentices?{br}I have got to learn that trick.

cards.title: Melt Armor
body: {Cathain} deals 1 target 4 fire damage. Increase damage dealt to that target by 1 until the start of your turn. {Cathain} or one of your Loci deals itself 2 irreducible infernal damage.

cards.title: Oceanic Locus
body: When this card enters play, destroy your other Loci. Whenever you play another Water card, {Cathain} gains 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: I have mastered the deep, not submitted to it.

cards.title: Siphon Elements
body: When {Cathain} deals himself infernal damage, increase the next non-infernal damage dealt by {Cathain} by 1.
powers: Destroy one of your Loci. {Cathain} gains HP equal to half its remaining HP, rounded up.

flavorQuotes.text: A little time, to reclaim invested power.

cards.title: Pyroclasm
body: When this card enters play, {Cathain} deals each non-hero target 2 fire damage and {Cathain} or one of your Loci deals itself 6 irreducible infernal damage.
The first time each turn each non-hero target is dealt non-fire damage, {Cathain} deals that target 1 fire damage.
At the end of your turn, if this card did not enter play this turn, destroy it.

flavorQuotes.text: This rock once bathed in fire.{br}It shall again.

cards.title: Sinking Morass
body: When this card enters play, destroy up to 3 ongoing or environment cards and {Cathain} or one of your Loci deals itself 6 irreducible infernal damage.
Reduce damage dealt by non-hero targets by 2.
At the end of your turn, if this card did not enter play this turn, destroy it.

flavorQuotes.text: I couldn'ta made a better trap.

cards.title: Telluric Locus
body: When this card enters play, destroy your other Loci. Whenever you play another Earth card, you may destroy an environment card.

flavorQuotes.text: The Earth. It trembles. Something approaches.

cards.title: Steam Geyser
body: When this card enters play, {Cathain} deals one target 5 fire damage, then {Cathain} or one of your Loci deals itself 6 irreducible infernal damage.
At the start of each turn, either {Cathain} deals 1 target 1 fire damage or 1 target gains 1 HP.
At the end of your turn, if this card did not enter play this turn, destroy it.

flavorQuotes.text: You used the thermal stress to{br}penetrate its shell. Very clever.

cards.title: Volcanic Locus
body: When this card enters play, destroy your other Loci. Whenever you play another Fire card, this card deals each non-hero target 1 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Please tell me you're not planning{br}to blow up Mt. Vesuvius?

cards.title: Shillelagh Draiochta
powers: {Cathain} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. Then he deals that target 1 cold damage if you played a Water card this turn, 1 fire damage if you played a Fire card this turn, 1 lightning damage if you played an Air card this turn, and 1 projectile damage if you played an Earth card this turn.
